channel.title: Runescape private server GUILDS?!?!? ~~need help please~~
channel.description: hey, well, i was just wondering if its possible to set up a guild system somewhat like WoW or Aion or something...that would be soooo awsome!! i know no one has ever thought of it so i think it would be cool to make something like that. =D im sorta new to all this stuff but im learning fast and i learn quick so if anyone has any ideas, that would be great. please tell me if you think this would be cool or not...=D peace

item.title: Runescape private server GUILDS?!?!? ~~need help please~~
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“cows1471, post:4, topic:326793”][quote author=djvawter link=topic=423199.msg3107201#msg3107201 date=1264254164]
thanks. =D
now i just gota find out how to do it…don’t even know where to start…=O
[/quote]

start with a level requirement[/quote]WoW guilds do not have a level requirement. Do you know what he’s talking about?

But, somebody HAS created a system like this before. It’s nothing new, but it’s also nothing that’s not a good idea. This is kind of what clans are for, though.

Read full topic
